title: BBC Cuts, Sinclair’s Takeover Push, Newsweek’s AI Move: Media News Recap for November
description: Catch up on November's biggest media stories, including NBC News' digital subscription and the end of the Farmers' Almanac.
content:
Welcome to Media Insider, PR Newswires roundup of the biggest media stories from the past month.
